== Distribution ==
== Distribution ==
â
Many [[Linux distribution]]s do not contain libdvdcss (for example [[Debian]], [[SUSE Linux]], and [[Ubuntu (operating system)|Ubuntu]]) due to fears of running afoul of [[Digital Millennium Copyright Act|DMCA]]-style laws. In other cases some distributions refrain from preloading libdvdcss onto their install discs but it is available in their software repositories. [[Linux Mint]] and [[Super OS|Super OS (aka Super Ubuntu)]] currently come pre-installed with libdvdcss.
+
Many [[Linux distribution]]s do not contain libdvdcss (for example [[Debian]], [[SUSE Linux]], and [[Ubuntu (operating system)|Ubuntu]]) due to fears of running afoul of [[Digital Millennium Copyright Act|DMCA]]-style laws. In other cases some distributions refrain from preloading libdvdcss onto their install discs but it is available in their software repositories. [[Linux Mint]] and [[Super OS]] currently come pre-installed with libdvdcss.
